attention1.ptxt: Do not disassemble seat cushion and adjuster of passenger seat since sensors for occupant classification system are equipped. Disassembling the seat cushion and adjuster may cause improper airbag deployment.

s1.ptxt: Disable air bag system referring to Disabling Air Bag System .
Disconnect seat harness coupler, seat heater coupler and side air bag coupler, if equipped.
Remove 4 mounting bolts to remove seat assembly.
Disassemble and repair seat as necessary.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure to install front seat.

item.ptxt: Torque to specifications as shown in Front Seat Components .
Enable air bag system referring to Enabling Air Bag System .
